article.headline: Prairie View 66, Ark.-Pine Bluff 64
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Derek Johnson led five players with double figures to push Prairie View A&M to a 66-64 victory over Arkansas-Pine Bluff Monday night. Johnson scored 16 and came off the bench to hit 4-of-7 from the field for Prairie View A&M (12-14). Darnell Hugee added 15, Chris Jones hit 13, Michael Griffin added 12 and Tim Meadows contributed 10. Lebaron Weathers led Arkansas-Pine Bluff (10-15) with 12. Terrance Calvin, Savalance Townsend and Tyree Glass each scored 11. Townsend had nine rebounds while Calvin and Glass each had seven rebounds. Prairie View A&M led 33-28 at the half.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
